name: Mahindra JIVO 305 DI VINEYARD 4WD
description: 18.3 kW (24.5 HP) tractor specifically designed for vineyards and inter-culture operations. Known for unmatched performance, power & mileage.

name: John Deere 5050E
description: 50 HP utility tractor with a 3-cylinder, 2900 CC engine (some sources state 2400cc) producing 2400 RPM. Manufactured in Pune, Maharashtra, India.

name: Sonalika DI 745 III
description: 50 HP tractor with a powerful 3-cylinder, 3065 cc engine, delivering excellent performance and productivity at 1900 rated RPM.

name: Swaraj 744 FE
description: 45-50 HP category tractor (often cited as 47 HP), equipped with a 3-cylinder, 3136 cc engine, providing real value for money to its owners.

name: Eicher 380
description: 40 HP tractor with a strong 3-cylinder, 2500 cc engine, designed to deliver superior performance across a wide range of farming tasks.
